seo.title: Iván Plaza | Web Development Portfolio
seo.description: Welcome to my web development portfolio. Explore my projects, experience, and technological skills.

resume.name: Iván Plaza
resume.role: Full Stack Developer specialized in Front-end and Back-end,
resume.description: passionate about creating innovative digital solutions and building scalable, high-performance web applications.

items.description: Designed and developed an application whose main objective is to streamline and improve the connection between professional applicants seeking employment and companies with available vacancies.
Designed and Developed a SPA (Single Page Application) using an API, featuring search, sorting, and filtering functionalities, along with a controlled form for creating food recipes.

Developed an App that functions as a small Blog with user registration and login functionalities. It allows users to create and edit profiles, and use a controlled form to post about Video Games, view other users' posts, and perform searches and sorting.

Implemented manual software testing on a live production website, developing planned test cases across three different sections of the site. Focused on bug hunting, creating detailed error reports including expected results, bug priority, objectives, and evidence to improve User Experience.

technologies.title: Technologies
technologies.description: In my journey through the web development world, I have cultivated experience and skills in a variety of technologies.

items.title: Huntek
items.description: Huntek is a platform that seeks to match candidates with ideal job opportunities, both for companies and individuals. It offers tracking and feedback for all matches made.

items.title: Tic-Tac-Toe
items.description: Tic-Tac-Toe is a digital version of the classic strategy game for two players. It was developed with modern web technologies to provide a simple and attractive experience.

items.title: Personal Portfolio
items.description: Personal portfolio website built with Astro and Tailwind CSS to showcase my projects, experience, and skills as a web developer.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: I'm always interested in hearing about new projects and opportunities. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, feel free to reach out!
